name: Parkour Simulator 0.1.0
description:
Parkour Simulator 0.1.0 is released.  Comment any bugs you found and please donate to help me develop my game!

Updates:

-added a third level.

Parkour Simulator is a challenging little game you can play on Windows, Linux and Mac. Follow me at Twitter to know when the game is updated! https://twitter.com/AlexTheDuck4
